com.servingxml.util.system
Interface RuntimeContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
AppContext, ConfigurationContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConfigurationContext, AbstractRuntimeContext, DefaultAppContext, DefaultServiceContext, IncludeConfigurationContext, RootConfigurationContext, ServiceContext, TopLevelConfigurationContext
public interface RuntimeContext

An RuntimeContext defines an interface for obtaining information about the service context and for reporting errors in that context.
